section.p: No sooner have you announced your challenge when one of the Soulwatch, the black-garbed, demon-masked religious police, stops you from proceeding.
'Exalted One, it is not seemly for one such as you to behave in such a manner!' whispers the Soulwatcher in a rather surprised yet insistent tone.
Two more of them arrive, and escort you from the bazaar. They are diffident and respectful, yet quite determined - you understand who holds the real power in Aku.
